alert.note: Alert for Drew (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 7:05PM CDT until June 26 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR DESHA...SOUTHEASTERN MONROE...NORTHEASTERN DREW...SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON...EASTERN LINCOLN AND ARKANSAS COUNTIES... At 705 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near St. Charles to 7 miles southeast of De Witt to near Gillett, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Dumas... Rosedale... Rohwer... Gould... Gillett... Holly Grove... Arkansas City... Mitchellville... Almyra... St. Charles... Tillar... Watson... Winchester... Lucca Landing... McGehee... Little Bayou Meto Park... Douglas... Trusten Holder WMA... Yancopin... Omega... TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
